H0.text: What is the largest island in the Mediterrainean Sea. Crete

H1.text: What is the largest island in the Mediterrainean Sea. Corsica

H2.text: What is the largest island in the Mediterrainean Sea. Sardinia

H3.text: What is the largest island in the Mediterrainean Sea. Sicily

A4.text: With 4.7 million inhabitants, including 1.2 million in and around the capital city of Palermo, it is both the largest and most populous island in the Mediterranean Sea.
